Text:
Lex, the criminal access to my account was reported to your host and a report to the FBI is being filed tomorrow in the Seattle field office. 

Hi abuse@alanticmetro.net,

 It appears that someone with the IP below accessed my Servage.net hosting account and downloaded an entire database of images that are now being distributed on the torrent site, PirateBay. The server that was hacked is in Germany and the access was logged at the time and date below.
2012-05-26 11:44:02	108.60.159.100	 United States

The file is being distributed at the URL below:

https://thepiratebay.se/torrent/7292807/Complete_Tentacle_Rape_(tentaclerape.net)_Image_RAR_05_22_2012

I am notifying you first of this and will follow up with a report to the Federal Bureau of Investigation. I would appreciate your assistance in identifying the thief and your cooperation with the the investigation, should the FBI or local authorities deem it appropriate to investigate.

@TentacleRape

Cool story bro. Even if you were the site owner (which you aren't, because I know them), you realize that the images are public, right?

I ripped them all using a spider. Hacking their servers would be a waste of time (albeit fun). I support the site though, so...no. 

Also, 108.60.159.100 is not my IP address lolz. Here's a hint: I use comcast, not atlanticmetro or whatever that shit is.

The real question is...why pretend to be them in the first place?

The fuck you do, bitch....LexTalionisVeritas. You obviously don't know me. The ONLY person at TR.net that I "know" is Azrael and you are not her. Also, my host captured your access and YES, your host has been notified.
The site is protected from hotlinking so no, you did not suck the content with a spider. You know me? the email me at my "official" address. I see a baseball bat in your future...

I have sent an email to admin@tentaclerape.net.

I will sort this out, and end this nonsense
LexTalionisVeritas fuck him when can we expect an up date good upload btw
